channel.title: Help Please Vps Help
channel.description:
Im buying a Vps dose it matter what location i buy it from it Says all These States Next to the Servers dose it matter im in uk and i buy 1 from Los angeles ?
please help my server is dedicated on this

item.title: Help Please Vps Help
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Location will be where it’s hosted from. Since allot of your users will probably be from the U.S, you should get one there, but you may have a slow connection to it since you’re in the U.K.

Read full topic
